amendment.description: To provide for interest rate caps for certain Federal student loans.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1778, under the order of 7/23/2013, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 53. Record Vote Number: 183.

action.text: Amendment SA 1778 proposed by Senator Reed to Amendment SA 1773.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1778 proposed by Senator Reed to Amendment SA 1773.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 1778, under the order of 7/23/2013, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 53. Record Vote Number: 183.
